title: Android Developer
description: We are seeking a talented Android Developer to build and maintain high-quality mobile applications. The ideal candidate should have experience in Kotlin/Java, Android SDK, and modern development frameworks.

title: AI Engineer
description: We are looking for a talented and passionate AI Engineer to join our team and drive innovation by developing intelligent systems and machine learning models. As an AI Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying AI solutions that solve real-world problems and enhance our products and services.
